org.apache.struts.actions
Class BaseAction

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.struts.action.Action
      org.apache.struts.actions.BaseAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
DispatchAction, DownloadAction, ForwardAction, IncludeAction, LocaleAction, SwitchAction
public abstract class BaseAction
extends Action

BaseAction is provided as an intermediate class for shared funtionality between Action and any stock implementation provided in this package.

Since:
Struts 1.3
Version:
$Rev$ $Date$
